name: That Dangerous Bridge
description:
In a hidden place far away from civilization, it exists a building where contains all the treasures you can imagine. Be expensive wine, a crown or even a lost statue, you can find it there. And you can go inside and take it. You only have to cross a bridge...

…One that have claim countless lives...

That Dangerous Bridge is an endless high-score platform game, focused on randomness, obstacles and increasing difficulty. It was made in 2014 for Ludum Dare #31, with the theme "Entire Game on One Screen". I decided to put it here on Itch.io because the old website disappeared along with the old LD games inside (unless you search well),  I hope you like it.

Controls:

  • Left/Right: Move
  • X: Jump
  • Enter: Pause
